package.description: PackageName to generate the code under.

copyright-header.description: CopyrightHeader is the header to add to the generated code. Use without //.

skip-prune.description: SkipPrune indicates whether to skip pruning unused components on the generated code.

output.description: Output specifies the output options for the generated code.

generate.description: Generate options for the generated code.

filter.description: Filter is the configuration for filtering the paths and operations to be parsed.

additional-imports.description: AdditionalImports defines any additional Go imports to add to the generated code.

error-mapping.description: ErrorMapping is the configuration for mapping the OpenAPI error responses to Go types. The key is the generated error type name and the value is the dotted json path to the string result.

client.description: Client defines options for the generated client.

user-templates.description: UserTemplates is the map of user-provided templates overriding the default ones.

user-context.description: UserContext is the map of user-provided context values to be used in templates user overrides.

use-single-file.description: Whether to generate the output into a single file.

directory.description: Directory where generated files should be placed.

filename.description: Filename to use if single file output is enabled.

client.description: Client specifies whether to generate a client. Defaults to false.

omit-description.description: OmitDescription specifies whether to omit schema description from the spec in the generated code. Defaults to false.

default-int-type.description: DefaultIntType specifies the default integer type to use in the generated code. Can be 'int', 'int32', or 'int64'. Defaults to 'int'.

always-prefix-enum-values.description: AlwaysPrefixEnumValues specifies whether to always prefix enum values with the schema name. Defaults to true.

include.description: Paths, tags, operation IDs, and schema properties to include.

exclude.description: Paths, tags, operation IDs, and schema properties to exclude.

paths.description: List of paths to include or exclude.

tags.description: List of tags to include or exclude.

operation-ids.description: List of operation IDs to include or exclude.

schema-properties.description: Mapping of schema names to property names to include or exclude.

extensions.description: List of extension names to include or exclude

name.description: Name of the generated client struct.
